contentList.content: Adorn a crown of seven star-like motes of light that orbit around your head and can be sent streaking towards a creature.
If you have four or more motes remaining, they shed a light in a [1] radius. If you have three or less motes, they shed a dim light in a [2] radius.
Crown of Stars
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
A splendorous crown of starlight motes orbit around your head. Expend a mote of light and send it streaking towards a creature.
Point and send negative energy toward a creature and cause it searing pain.
Touch a creature and stimulate its natural healing ability.
The target regains [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> at the start of each turn until <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>. Any severed body parts are also restored.
Befuddlement
Blast the mind of a creature within range, attempting to shatter its mind and render it unable to cast spells.

Only powerful healing spells such as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_GreaterRestoration">Greater Restoration</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Heal">Heal</LSTag> can remove the effect of this spell.
Befuddled
Mind has been shattered by powerful magic. Unable to cast spells.
Holy Aura

Divine light washes out from you in a [1] radius. Allied creatures within the aura shed a dim light in a [2] radius and have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>, and enemy creatures have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against them.
Fiends and undead must succeed on a Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> on a hit against an affected ally or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
Holy Aura
Divine light washes out in a [1] radius, protecting allies and potentially <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinding</LSTag> opposing fiends and undead.
Holy Aura
Divine light is protecting this creature from attackers.
Maddening Darkness: Sphere

Conjure a nightmarish cloud of darkness filled with shrieks, gibbering, and mad laughter. All creatures inside are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> and suffer Psychic damage each turn.
Maddening Darkness

A sphere of maddening blackness filled with shrieks, gibbering, and mad laughter.

Creatures starting their turn in the area take [1].

Creatures within the area are Blinded.
Maddening Darkness
Bombarded with shrieking and wailing.
Maddening Darkness
Bombarded with shrieking and wailing.
%%% Maddening Darkness Technical
Maddening Darkness: Enchant
Mind Blank

Touch an allied creature, making them <LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Psychic damage and being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>. In addition, the target is also unaffected by anything that senses its emotions, read its thoughts, or control its mind.
No spell, not even <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Wish">Wish</LSTag>, can affect the creatures mind or gain information about them.
Mind Blank

<LSTag Tooltip="Immune">Immune</LSTag> to Psychic damage and being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> and is also unaffected by anything that senses its emotions, read its thoughts, or control its mind.
Foresight

Bestow a creature with a limited ability to see into the immediate future. The target cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag> and has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on D20 Tests. Other creatures have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> when making <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against the creature.
Foresight

Insight into the future grants <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on D20 Test rolls and imparts <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> on enemies targeting this creature.
Power Word Heal

A wave of healing energy washes over a creature you can see, regaining all its <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> and removing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PARALYZED">Paralyzed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="POISONED">Poisoned</LSTag>, or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag> conditions.
If the creature is <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>, it can use its <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">reaction</LSTag> to stand up.
Power Word Heal
Power Word Kill
Compel a creature with [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag> or fewer to die instantly. Otherwise, it takes [2].
